explains: v. 折磨，使痛苦；（天体）相对于（另一天体或黄道上某点）处于应力星位

sentences.en: There are two main problems which afflict people with hearing impairments.
sentences.cn: 有两大问题困扰有听觉障碍的人。

sentences.en: ECONOMIC woes afflict many at the moment.
sentences.cn: 经济灾难此刻折磨着许多人。

sentences.en: I don't want to afflict you with my troubles.
sentences.cn: 我不想使你为我的困难而苦恼。
